Text:
Why not just head to http://windows.microsoft.com/en-US/windows-8/download and download it there from the official Microsoft website?

This is the consumer preview version of Windows 8 and is available to thegeneral public. 

You will also be issued a Product Key.

I believe Microsoft says it will expire on or around: 01/15/2013.
